text: The word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] that came to Micah [strongs id="h4318" /] the Morasthite [strongs id="h4183" /] in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of Jotham [strongs id="h3147" /], Ahaz [strongs id="h271" /], [and] Hezekiah [strongs id="h3169" /], kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], which he saw [strongs id="h2372" tvm="8804" /] concerning Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /] and Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /], all ye people [strongs id="h5971" /]; hearken [strongs id="h7181" tvm="8685" /], O earth [strongs id="h776" /], and all that therein [strongs id="h4393" /] is: and let the Lord [strongs id="h136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /] be witness [strongs id="h5707" /] against you, the Lord [strongs id="h136" /] from his holy [strongs id="h6944" /] temple [strongs id="h1964" /].

For, behold, the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] cometh forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8802" /] out of his place [strongs id="h4725" /], and will come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8804" /], and tread [strongs id="h1869" tvm="8804" /] upon the high places [strongs id="h1116" /] of the earth [strongs id="h776" /].

And the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] shall be molten [strongs id="h4549" tvm="8738" /] under him, and the valleys [strongs id="h6010" /] shall be cleft [strongs id="h1234" tvm="8691" /], as wax [strongs id="h1749" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the fire [strongs id="h784" /], [and] as the waters [strongs id="h4325" /] [that are] poured [strongs id="h5064" tvm="8716" /] down a steep place [strongs id="h4174" /].

For the transgression [strongs id="h6588" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /] [is] all this, and for the sins [strongs id="h2403" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /]. What [is] the transgression [strongs id="h6588" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /]? [is it] not Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /]? and what [are] the high places [strongs id="h1116" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /]? [are they] not Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /]?

Therefore I will make [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8804" /] Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /] as an heap [strongs id="h5856" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /], [and] as plantings [strongs id="h4302" /] of a vineyard [strongs id="h3754" /]: and I will pour down [strongs id="h5064" tvm="8689" /] the stones [strongs id="h68" /] thereof into the valley [strongs id="h1516" /], and I will discover [strongs id="h1540" tvm="8762" /] the foundations [strongs id="h3247" /] thereof.

And all the graven images [strongs id="h6456" /] thereof shall be beaten to pieces [strongs id="h3807" tvm="8714" /], and all the hires [strongs id="h868" /] thereof shall be burned [strongs id="h8313" tvm="8735" /] with the fire [strongs id="h784" /], and all the idols [strongs id="h6091" /] thereof will I lay [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] desolate [strongs id="h8077" /]: for she gathered [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8765" /] [it] of the hire [strongs id="h868" /] of an harlot [strongs id="h2181" tvm="8802" /], and they shall return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] to the hire [strongs id="h868" /] of an harlot [strongs id="h2181" tvm="8802" /].

Therefore I will wail [strongs id="h5594" tvm="8799" /] and howl [strongs id="h3213" tvm="8686" /], I will go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] stripped [strongs id="h7758" tvm="8675" /] [strongs id="h7758" /] and naked [strongs id="h6174" /]: I will make [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] a wailing [strongs id="h4553" /] like the dragons [strongs id="h8577" /], and mourning [strongs id="h60" /] as the owls [strongs id="h1323" /] [strongs id="h3284" /].

For her wound [strongs id="h4347" /] [is] incurable [strongs id="h605" tvm="8803" /]; for it is come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] unto Judah [strongs id="h3063" /]; he is come [strongs id="h5060" tvm="8804" /] unto the gate [strongs id="h8179" /] of my people [strongs id="h5971" /], [even] to Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

Declare [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8686" /] ye [it] not at Gath [strongs id="h1661" /], weep [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8799" /] ye not at all [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8800" /]: in the house of Aphrah [strongs id="h1036" /] roll [strongs id="h6428" tvm="8690" tvm2="8675" /] [strongs id="h6428" tvm="8694" /] thyself in the dust [strongs id="h6083" /].

Pass ye away [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8798" /], thou inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Saphir [strongs id="h8208" /], having thy shame [strongs id="h1322" /] naked [strongs id="h6181" /]: the inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Zaanan [strongs id="h6630" /] came not forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8804" /] in the mourning [strongs id="h4553" /] of Bethezel [strongs id="h1018" /]; he shall receive [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] of you his standing [strongs id="h5979" /].

For the inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Maroth [strongs id="h4796" /] waited carefully [strongs id="h2342" tvm="8804" /] for good [strongs id="h2896" /]: but evil [strongs id="h7451" /] came down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8804" /] from the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] unto the gate [strongs id="h8179" /] of Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

O thou inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Lachish [strongs id="h3923" /], bind [strongs id="h7573" tvm="8798" /] the chariot [strongs id="h4818" /] to the swift beast [strongs id="h7409" /]: she [is] the beginning [strongs id="h7225" /] of the sin [strongs id="h2403" /] to the daughter [strongs id="h1323" /] of Zion [strongs id="h6726" /]: for the transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] were found [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8738" /] in thee.

Therefore shalt thou give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] presents [strongs id="h7964" /] to Moreshethgath [strongs id="h4182" /]: the houses [strongs id="h1004" /] of Achzib [strongs id="h392" /] [shall be] a lie [strongs id="h391" /] to the kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].

Yet will I bring [strongs id="h935" tvm="8686" /] an heir [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8802" /] unto thee, O inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Mareshah [strongs id="h4762" /]: he shall come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] unto Adullam [strongs id="h5725" /] the glory [strongs id="h3519" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].

Make thee bald [strongs id="h7139" tvm="8798" /], and poll [strongs id="h1494" tvm="8798" /] thee for thy delicate [strongs id="h8588" /] children [strongs id="h1121" /]; enlarge [strongs id="h7337" tvm="8685" /] thy baldness [strongs id="h7144" /] as the eagle [strongs id="h5404" /]; for they are gone into captivity [strongs id="h1540" tvm="8804" /] from thee.

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] to them that devise [strongs id="h2803" tvm="8802" /] iniquity [strongs id="h205" /], and work [strongs id="h6466" tvm="8802" /] evil [strongs id="h7451" /] upon their beds [strongs id="h4904" /]! when the morning [strongs id="h1242" /] is light [strongs id="h216" /], they practise [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] it, because it is [strongs id="h3426" /] in the power [strongs id="h410" /] of their hand [strongs id="h3027" /].

And they covet [strongs id="h2530" tvm="8804" /] fields [strongs id="h7704" /], and take [them] by violence [strongs id="h1497" tvm="8804" /]; and houses [strongs id="h1004" /], and take [them] away [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /]: so they oppress [strongs id="h6231" tvm="8804" /] a man [strongs id="h1397" /] and his house [strongs id="h1004" /], even a man [strongs id="h376" /] and his heritage [strongs id="h5159" /].

Therefore thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; Behold, against this family [strongs id="h4940" /] do I devise [strongs id="h2803" tvm="8802" /] an evil [strongs id="h7451" /], from which ye shall not remove [strongs id="h4185" tvm="8686" /] your necks [strongs id="h6677" /]; neither shall ye go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] haughtily [strongs id="h7317" /]: for this time [strongs id="h6256" /] [is] evil [strongs id="h7451" /].

In that day [strongs id="h3117" /] shall [one] take up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] a parable [strongs id="h4912" /] against you, and lament [strongs id="h5091" tvm="8804" /] with a doleful [strongs id="h5093" /] lamentation [strongs id="h5092" /], [and] say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], We be utterly [strongs id="h7703" tvm="8800" /] spoiled [strongs id="h7703" tvm="8738" /]: he hath changed [strongs id="h4171" tvm="8686" /] the portion [strongs id="h2506" /] of my people [strongs id="h5971" /]: how hath he removed [strongs id="h4185" tvm="8686" /] [it] from me! turning away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8788" /] he hath divided [strongs id="h2505" tvm="8762" /] our fields [strongs id="h7704" /].

Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast [strongs id="h7993" tvm="8688" /] a cord [strongs id="h2256" /] by lot [strongs id="h1486" /] in the congregation [strongs id="h6951" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Prophesy [strongs id="h5197" tvm="8686" /] ye not, [say they to them that] prophesy [strongs id="h5197" tvm="8686" /]: they shall not prophesy [strongs id="h5197" tvm="8686" /] to them, [that] they shall not take [strongs id="h5253" tvm="8799" /] shame [strongs id="h3639" /].

O [thou that art] named [strongs id="h559" tvm="8803" /] the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], is the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] straitened [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8804" /]? [are] these his doings [strongs id="h4611" /]? do not my words [strongs id="h1697" /] do good [strongs id="h3190" tvm="8686" /] to him that walketh [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8802" /] uprightly [strongs id="h3477" /]?

Even of late [strongs id="h865" /] my people [strongs id="h5971" /] is risen up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8787" /] as an enemy [strongs id="h341" tvm="8802" /]: ye pull off [strongs id="h6584" tvm="8686" /] the robe [strongs id="h145" /] with [strongs id="h4136" /] the garment [strongs id="h8008" /] from them that pass [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8802" /] by securely [strongs id="h983" /] as men averse [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8803" /] from war [strongs id="h4421" /].

The women [strongs id="h802" /] of my people [strongs id="h5971" /] have ye cast out [strongs id="h1644" tvm="8762" /] from their pleasant [strongs id="h8588" /] houses [strongs id="h1004" /]; from their children [strongs id="h5768" /] have ye taken away [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] my glory [strongs id="h1926" /] for ever [strongs id="h5769" /].

Arise [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8798" /] ye, and depart [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /]; for this [is] not [your] rest [strongs id="h4496" /]: because it is polluted [strongs id="h2930" tvm="8800" /], it shall destroy [strongs id="h2254" tvm="8762" /] [you], even with a sore [strongs id="h4834" tvm="8737" /] destruction [strongs id="h2256" /].

If [strongs id="h3863" /] a man [strongs id="h376" /] walking [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8802" /] in the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] and falsehood [strongs id="h8267" /] do lie [strongs id="h3576" tvm="8765" /], [saying], I will prophesy [strongs id="h5197" tvm="8686" /] unto thee of wine [strongs id="h3196" /] and of strong drink [strongs id="h7941" /]; he shall even be the prophet [strongs id="h5197" tvm="8688" /] of this people [strongs id="h5971" /].

I will surely [strongs id="h622" tvm="8800" /] assemble [strongs id="h622" tvm="8799" /], O Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], all of thee; I will surely [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8763" /] gather [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8762" /] the remnant [strongs id="h7611" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /]; I will put [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] them together [strongs id="h3162" /] as the sheep [strongs id="h6629" /] of Bozrah [strongs id="h1223" tvm="8677" /] [strongs id="h1224" /], as the flock [strongs id="h5739" /] in the midst [strongs id="h8432" /] of their fold [strongs id="h1699" /]: they shall make great noise [strongs id="h1949" tvm="8686" /] by reason of [the multitude of] men [strongs id="h120" /].

The breaker [strongs id="h6555" tvm="8802" /] is come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] them: they have broken up [strongs id="h6555" tvm="8804" /], and have passed through [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /] the gate [strongs id="h8179" /], and are gone out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] by it: and their king [strongs id="h4428" /] shall pass [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] them, and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] on the head [strongs id="h7218" /] of them.

And I said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /], I pray you, O heads [strongs id="h7218" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], and ye princes [strongs id="h7101" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /]; [Is it] not for you to know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8800" /] judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]?

Who hate [strongs id="h8130" tvm="8802" /] the good [strongs id="h2896" /], and love [strongs id="h157" tvm="8802" /] the evil [strongs id="h7451" /]; who pluck off [strongs id="h1497" tvm="8802" /] their skin [strongs id="h5785" /] from off them, and their flesh [strongs id="h7607" /] from off their bones [strongs id="h6106" /];

Who also eat [strongs id="h398" tvm="8804" /] the flesh [strongs id="h7607" /] of my people [strongs id="h5971" /], and flay [strongs id="h6584" tvm="8689" /] their skin [strongs id="h5785" /] from off them; and they break [strongs id="h6476" tvm="8765" /] their bones [strongs id="h6106" /], and chop them in pieces [strongs id="h6566" tvm="8804" /], as for the pot [strongs id="h5518" /], and as flesh [strongs id="h1320" /] within [strongs id="h8432" /] the caldron [strongs id="h7037" /].

Then shall they cry [strongs id="h2199" tvm="8799" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], but he will not hear [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] them: he will even hide [strongs id="h5641" tvm="8686" /] his face [strongs id="h6440" /] from them at that time [strongs id="h6256" /], as they have behaved themselves ill [strongs id="h7489" tvm="8689" /] in their doings [strongs id="h4611" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] concerning the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /] that make my people [strongs id="h5971" /] err [strongs id="h8582" tvm="8688" /], that bite [strongs id="h5391" tvm="8802" /] with their teeth [strongs id="h8127" /], and cry [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8804" /], Peace [strongs id="h7965" /]; and he that putteth [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] not into their mouths [strongs id="h6310" /], they even prepare [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8765" /] war [strongs id="h4421" /] against him.

Therefore night [strongs id="h3915" /] [shall be] unto you, that ye shall not have a vision [strongs id="h2377" /]; and it shall be dark [strongs id="h2821" tvm="8675" /] [strongs id="h2821" tvm="8804" /] unto you, that ye shall not divine [strongs id="h7080" tvm="8800" /]; and the sun [strongs id="h8121" /] shall go down [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] over the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /], and the day [strongs id="h3117" /] shall be dark [strongs id="h6937" tvm="8804" /] over them.

Then shall the seers [strongs id="h2374" /] be ashamed [strongs id="h954" tvm="8804" /], and the diviners [strongs id="h7080" tvm="8802" /] confounded [strongs id="h2659" tvm="8804" /]: yea, they shall all cover [strongs id="h5844" tvm="8804" /] their lips [strongs id="h8222" /]; for [there is] no answer [strongs id="h4617" /] of God [strongs id="h430" /].

But truly [strongs id="h199" /] I am full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8804" /] of power [strongs id="h3581" /] by the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and of judgment [strongs id="h4941" /], and of might [strongs id="h1369" /], to declare [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8687" /] unto Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /] his transgression [strongs id="h6588" /], and to Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] his sin [strongs id="h2403" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /] this, I pray you, ye heads [strongs id="h7218" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], and princes [strongs id="h7101" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], that abhor [strongs id="h8581" tvm="8764" /] judgment [strongs id="h4941" /], and pervert [strongs id="h6140" tvm="8762" /] all equity [strongs id="h3477" /].
They build up [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8802" /] Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] with blood [strongs id="h1818" /], and Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] with iniquity [strongs id="h5766" /].

The heads [strongs id="h7218" /] thereof judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8799" /] for reward [strongs id="h7810" /], and the priests [strongs id="h3548" /] thereof teach [strongs id="h3384" tvm="8686" /] for hire [strongs id="h4242" /], and the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /] thereof divine [strongs id="h7080" tvm="8799" /] for money [strongs id="h3701" /]: yet will they lean [strongs id="h8172" tvm="8735" /] upon the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], [Is] not the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] among [strongs id="h7130" /] us? none evil [strongs id="h7451" /] can come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] upon us.

Therefore shall Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] for your sake [strongs id="h1558" /] be plowed [strongs id="h2790" tvm="8735" /] [as] a field [strongs id="h7704" /], and Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] shall become heaps [strongs id="h5856" /], and the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] as the high places [strongs id="h1116" /] of the forest [strongs id="h3293" /].

But in the last [strongs id="h319" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /] it shall come to pass, [that] the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] shall be established [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8737" /] in the top [strongs id="h7218" /] of the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /], and it shall be exalted [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8737" /] above the hills [strongs id="h1389" /]; and people [strongs id="h5971" /] shall flow [strongs id="h5102" tvm="8804" /] unto it.

And many [strongs id="h7227" /] nations [strongs id="h1471" /] shall come [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /], and say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], Come [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /], and let us go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] to the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and to the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the God [strongs id="h430" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /]; and he will teach [strongs id="h3384" tvm="8686" /] us of his ways [strongs id="h1870" /], and we will walk [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] in his paths [strongs id="h734" /]: for the law [strongs id="h8451" /] shall go forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] of Zion [strongs id="h6726" /], and the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] from Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

And he shall judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8804" /] among many [strongs id="h7227" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /], and rebuke [strongs id="h3198" tvm="8689" /] strong [strongs id="h6099" /] nations [strongs id="h1471" /] afar off [strongs id="h7350" /]; and they shall beat [strongs id="h3807" tvm="8765" /] their swords [strongs id="h2719" /] into plowshares [strongs id="h855" /], and their spears [strongs id="h2595" /] into pruninghooks [strongs id="h4211" /]: nation [strongs id="h1471" /] shall not lift up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] a sword [strongs id="h2719" /] against nation [strongs id="h1471" /], neither shall they learn [strongs id="h3925" tvm="8799" /] war [strongs id="h4421" /] any more.
